'''Ayizu''' is a historical character in ''Genshin Impact''.

==Profile==
<!-- Detailed story/lore information goes here -->
Ayizu was the Chief of the [[Masters of the Night-Wind]] 500 years ago.

===Appearance===
''(To be added.)''

==Story==
[[The Captain]], at that moment still as Thrain, and the remainder of his platoon met Ayizu when he fled to [[Natlan]] after they failed to save [[Khaenri'ah]] from the rampage of the [[Abyss]]. Thrain, together with Ayizu, defended Natlan and fought many battles and overcame countless hardships. However, Ayizu was unable to escape his fate. During his final moments, he told The Captain about the secret of the [[Gnosis]].
